generator_snippet:
DEFINE ATTRIBUTE SET target_ean_attr AS
ean,upc,isbn
DEFINE RULE SET ean_match_rules AS
ean_rule
DEFINE RULE ean_rule AS
ID MATCH eanno WITH ATTRIBUTE SET target_ean_attr USING THRESHOLD 1.0

DEFINE ATTRIBUTE SET source_item_name_attr AS
item_name
DEFINE RULE SET t2s_titleval_match_rules AS
t2s_titleval_match_rule
DEFINE RULE t2s_titleval_match_rule AS
ID1 MATCH titleval WITH ATTRIBUTE SET source_item_name_attr USING THRESHOLD 0.3

DEFINE ATTRIBUTE SET target_brand_attr AS
brandval,titleval
DEFINE RULE SET brand_match_rules AS
brand_match_rule
DEFINE RULE brand_match_rule AS
ID MATCH brand OR manufacturer OR brand_name WITH ATTRIBUTE SET target_brand_attr USING THRESHOLD 1.0

DEFINE ATTRIBUTE SET target_model_attr AS
modelno

DEFINE RULE SET s2t_model_match_rules AS
source_to_target_model_match_rules

DEFINE RULE source_to_target_model_match_rules AS
ID1 MATCH model OR matching_part_number OR part_number OR model_number WITH ATTRIBUTE SET target_model_attr USING THRESHOLD 1.0

DEFINE ATTRIBUTE SET target_color_attr AS
colorval

DEFINE RULE SET color_match_rules AS
color_rules

DEFINE RULE color_rules AS
ID MATCH color OR color_keyword WITH ATTRIBUTE SET target_color_attr USING THRESHOLD 1.0

DEFINE ATTRIBUTE SET target_size_attr AS
t_size

DEFINE RULE SET size_match_rules AS
size_rule

DEFINE RULE size_rule AS
ID MATCH deprecated_clothing_size OR size_map OR size WITH ATTRIBUTE SET target_size_attr USING THRESHOLD 1.0

DEFINE ATTRIBUTE SET target_gender_attr AS
genderval
  
DEFINE RULE SET s2t_gender_match_rules AS
s2t_gender_match_rule
  
DEFINE RULE s2t_gender_match_rule AS
ID MATCH department OR department1 OR department2 WITH ATTRIBUTE SET target_gender_attr USING THRESHOLD 1.0

DEFINE ATTRIBUTE SET source_attr1 AS
department,department1,department2
  
DEFINE RULE SET t2s_gender_match_rules AS
t2s_gender_match_rule
  
DEFINE RULE t2s_gender_match_rule AS
ID MATCH gender WITH ATTRIBUTE SET source_attr1 USING THRESHOLD 1.0
